entities.description: Frequency with which parents express pride in something the respondent has done.
Frequency of arguments or fights with parents over the past 12 months.
Frequency of getting into serious fights at school or work over the past 12 months.
Frequency of participating in group fights over the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates how often parents told the respondent they were proud of something they did.
Indicates how often the respondent argued or had a fight with at least one of their parents.
Indicates how often the respondent got into serious fights at school or work.
Indicates how often the respondent took part in a fight where a group of friends fought against another group.
